content: Blade Monk is a Spirit that lurks in the Pagoda Realm. It's easiest to find him after defeating Captain Wise-Voice and clearing the Pagoda. Once you've done so, head to the Outside the Wheel Keeper's Shrine and turn back to face the Pagoda. Head over to the platform on the right, where you will see a single wooden chest.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blade_Monk_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Blade Monk Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Blade Monk Location'.
The content is as follows:
Blade Monk is a Spirit that lurks in the Pagoda Realm. It's easiest to find him after defeating Captain Wise-Voice and clearing the Pagoda. Once you've done so, head to the Outside the Wheel Keeper's Shrine and turn back to face the Pagoda. Head over to the platform on the right, where you will see a single wooden chest.
